#
#  ref[eng_] := Sqrt[1 + (34.76 * (12.632^2 - eng^2))/((12.632^2 - eng^2)^2 + 0.33^2*eng^2) + 236.6/(18.37^2 - eng^2)]
#  Plot[ref[1230/\[Lambda]], {\[Lambda], 120, 300}]
